akn:section.akn:heading: Change of registered agent by entity.

akn:content.akn:p: A represented entity may change the information on file under ยง 29-104.04(a) by delivering to the Mayor for filing a statement of change signed on behalf of an authorized person on behalf of the entity which states the:
The interest holders or governors of a domestic entity need not approve the filing of a:
A statement of change under this section designating a new registered agent shall be an affirmation under ยง 29-102.09 by the represented entity that the agent has consented to serve.

As an alternative to using the procedure in this section, a represented entity may change the information on file under ยง 29-104.04(a) by amending its most recent registered agent filing in a manner provided by law of the District other than this title for amending the filing.
